About Me
============

Hi! My name is João Victor, I'm a ph.D student at Univesity of São Paulo (USP-SP) in Computational Physics. In the last years I've been working with machine learning and data science. This site is a space to add my personal notes. Feel free to write for me or send me a message at linkedin.

Contact (Linkedin) : https://www.linkedin.com/in/jo%C3%A3o-victor-vilela-cassiano-a5123a185/

Contact (Gmail) : joaocassianox7x@gmail.com
